### Dissertation Project – Spatial optimisation for conservation reserve selection
<p>Optimising reserve selection under pine marten recolonisation in Cumbria. Combines species interaction modelling with spatial optimisation to propose viable red squirrel strongholds under predator recovery scenarios.</p>
<div class="meta">Tools: Python, GeoPandas, ArcGIS Pro</div>
